name: Partix
description:
Partix is a 2D action top-down shooter, where you get to control your gunship of choice and must survive as long as you can against enemies.

There are 3 ships to choose and 3 different arenas, with various difficulty.

Each ship has a main gun, as well as a Special attack. Try them all and see which one you like the most!

If you have any thoughts to share or some suggestions / critique, feel free to leave a comment :D
